front.title: ISIS Mesh Groups Mesh Groups for IS-IS

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to reduce redundant packettransmissions for the IS-IS Routing protocol, as described inRFC 1142 [1], when it is used to construct routing tables forIP networks, as described in RFC 1195 [2]. The describedmechanism can be used to reduce the flooding of Link StatePDUs (LSPs) in IS-IS topologies with fully meshed routers.
